summary: This is an email chain from April 26, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing the preparation of an update memo on the Jeffrey Epstein case for an upcoming meeting. It includes attachments of status memos and shows coordination among staff.

events.title: Email coordination for Epstein case update
events.description: Email exchange among USANYS staff about preparing an update memo on the Epstein case status for an upcoming meeting.

events.title: Previous status memo prepared
events.description: Reference to a previous status memo on the Epstein case dated March 12, 2019, which was attached to the email.

keyFacts: The email chain shows internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case in April 2019.
Attachments include status memos dated March 12, 2019, and April 26, 2019, indicating ongoing case monitoring and reporting.
The purpose was to prepare an update memo for an upcoming meeting, highlighting continued investigative or legal activity related to Epstein at that time.
